const root = {
  val: 0,
  left: {
    val: 1,
    left: {
      val: 2,
      left: {
        val: 3
      }
    },
    right: {
      val: 4
    }
  },
  right: {
    val: 5
  }
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘æœ€å¤§æ·±åº¦ â€‹

é€’å½’ã€é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼Œ é˜Ÿåˆ—æ³¨æ„å…ˆå…¥é˜Ÿçš„å…ˆå‡ºé˜Ÿ

js
// é€’å½’
const maxDepth = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  const left = maxDepth(root.left);
  const right = maxDepth(root.right);
  return 1 + Math.max(left, right);
};

// éé€’å½’
const maxDepth2 = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  const stack = [root];
  let max = 0;
  // ä¸€æ¬¡éå†å°±æ˜¯ä¸€å±‚
  while(stack.length) {
    const len = stack.length;
    max++;
    // æ¸…ç©ºï¼Œå¹¶å°†å½“å‰å±‚çš„å­æ ‘å…¥é˜Ÿ
    while(len--) {
      // å…ˆå…¥é˜Ÿçš„å…ˆå‡ºé˜Ÿ
      const node = stack.shift();
      // å­æ ‘å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left);
      node.right && stack.push(node.right);
    }
  }
  return max;
}
// é€’å½’
const maxDepth = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  const left = maxDepth(root.left);
  const right = maxDepth(root.right);
  return 1 + Math.max(left, right);
};

// éé€’å½’
const maxDepth2 = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  const stack = [root];
  let max = 0;
  // ä¸€æ¬¡éå†å°±æ˜¯ä¸€å±‚
  while(stack.length) {
    const len = stack.length;
    max++;
    // æ¸…ç©ºï¼Œå¹¶å°†å½“å‰å±‚çš„å­æ ‘å…¥é˜Ÿ
    while(len--) {
      // å…ˆå…¥é˜Ÿçš„å…ˆå‡ºé˜Ÿ
      const node = stack.shift();
      // å­æ ‘å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left);
      node.right && stack.push(node.right);
    }
  }
  return max;
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘æœ€å°æ·±åº¦ â€‹

é˜Ÿåˆ— ä¸­ä¿å­˜ å­æ ‘ å’Œ å±‚çº§ ï¼Œå·¦å³æ²¡æœ‰å­æ ‘çš„æ—¶å€™ç›´æ¥è¿”å›å±‚çº§

js
const minDepth = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  // å‚¨å­˜èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€ å±‚çº§
  const stack = [[root, 1]];
  while(stack.length) {
    const [node, n] = stack.shift();
    // å·¦å³éƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œè¿”å›å±‚çº§
    if (!node.left && !node.right) {
      return n;
    }
    // æœ‰å­æ ‘éƒ½å¾—å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push([node.left, n + 1]);
    node.right && stack.push([node.right, n + 1]);
  }
}
const minDepth = (root) => {
  if (!root) return 0;
  // å‚¨å­˜èŠ‚ç‚¹ã€ å±‚çº§
  const stack = [[root, 1]];
  while(stack.length) {
    const [node, n] = stack.shift();
    // å·¦å³éƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œè¿”å›å±‚çº§
    if (!node.left && !node.right) {
      return n;
    }
    // æœ‰å­æ ‘éƒ½å¾—å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push([node.left, n + 1]);
    node.right && stack.push([node.right, n + 1]);
  }
}

ç¿»è½¬äºŒå‰æ ‘ â€‹

é€’å½’ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸­é—´å˜é‡äº¤æ¢å·¦å³å­æ ‘

js
const invertTree = (root) => {
  if (!root) return null;

  const tmp = root.left;
  root.left = root.right;
  root.right = tmp;

  invertTree(root.left);
  invertTree(root.right);

  return root;
}
const invertTree = (root) => {
  if (!root) return null;

  const tmp = root.left;
  root.left = root.right;
  root.right = tmp;

  invertTree(root.left);
  invertTree(root.right);

  return root;
}

å¯¹ç§°äºŒå‰æ ‘ â€‹

éªŒè¯äºŒå‰æ ‘æ˜¯å¦è½´å¯¹ç§°

é€’å½’ï¼Œæ¯”å¯¹å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œæ¯”å¯¹ å·¦å­æ ‘çš„å·¦ å’Œ å³å­æ ‘çš„å³ï¼Œæ¯”å¯¹å·¦å­æ ‘çš„å³å’Œå³å­æ ‘çš„å·¦

js
const isSymmetric = function(root) {
  const fn = (l, r) => {
    // å·¦å³å­æ ‘ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›true
    if (!l && !r) return true;
    // å·¦å³å­æ ‘åªå­˜åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œè¿”å›false
    if (!l || !r) return false;
    // æ¯”è¾ƒå·¦å³å­æ ‘å€¼ï¼Œé€’å½’æ¯”è¾ƒå·¦å­æ ‘çš„å·¦å’Œå³å­æ ‘çš„å³ï¼Œå·¦å­æ ‘çš„å³å’Œå³å­æ ‘çš„å·¦
    return l.val === r.val && fn(l.left, r.right) && fn(l.right, r.left);
  };
  return fn(root, root);
};
const isSymmetric = function(root) {
  const fn = (l, r) => {
    // å·¦å³å­æ ‘ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œè¿”å›true
    if (!l && !r) return true;
    // å·¦å³å­æ ‘åªå­˜åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œè¿”å›false
    if (!l || !r) return false;
    // æ¯”è¾ƒå·¦å³å­æ ‘å€¼ï¼Œé€’å½’æ¯”è¾ƒå·¦å­æ ‘çš„å·¦å’Œå³å­æ ‘çš„å³ï¼Œå·¦å­æ ‘çš„å³å’Œå³å­æ ‘çš„å·¦
    return l.val === r.val && fn(l.left, r.right) && fn(l.right, r.left);
  };
  return fn(root, root);
};

const arr = [];
const depthFirst = (root) => {
  if (!root) return arr;
  arr.push(root.val);
  root.left && depthFirst(root.left);
  root.right && depthFirst(root.right);
}
arr;
const arr = [];
const depthFirst = (root) => {
  if (!root) return arr;
  arr.push(root.val);
  root.left && depthFirst(root.left);
  root.right && depthFirst(root.right);
}
arr;

äºŒå‰æ ‘å¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå† â€‹

é˜Ÿåˆ—ï¼ˆå…ˆè¿›åå‡ºï¼‰ï¼Œ æ¯ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½éœ€å°†å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»å³è¾¹å…¥é˜Ÿï¼Œéå†æ—¶ä»å·¦è¾¹å‡ºé˜Ÿ

js
const breadthFirst = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // ç»´æŠ¤é˜Ÿåˆ—
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºé˜Ÿ
    const node = stack.shift();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}
const breadthFirst = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // ç»´æŠ¤é˜Ÿåˆ—
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºé˜Ÿ
    const node = stack.shift();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // å…¥é˜Ÿ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}

å±‚åºéå† â€‹

é€’å½’ï¼Œæ³¨æ„è¦å…ˆéå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œæ‰èƒ½è¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€å±‚éå†ï¼Œè¿”å›å€¼åº”è¯¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ç”¨äºå‚¨å­˜æ¯ä¸€å±‚çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼

js
const levelOrder = (root) => {
  const arr = []
  if (!root) return arr

  const stack = [root]
  while(stack.length) {
    let len = stack.length
    // ä¸€å±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸´æ—¶å‚¨å­˜
    const tmp = []
    while(len--) {
      const node = stack.shift()
      tmp.push(node.val)
      // æŒ‰é¡ºåº å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left)
      node.right && stack.push(node.right)
    }
    // éå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œpush è¿› arr
    arr.push(tmp)
  }
}
const levelOrder = (root) => {
  const arr = []
  if (!root) return arr

  const stack = [root]
  while(stack.length) {
    let len = stack.length
    // ä¸€å±‚ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ç»„ä¸´æ—¶å‚¨å­˜
    const tmp = []
    while(len--) {
      const node = stack.shift()
      tmp.push(node.val)
      // æŒ‰é¡ºåº å…¥é˜Ÿ
      node.left && stack.push(node.left)
      node.right && stack.push(node.right)
    }
    // éå†å®Œä¸€å±‚ï¼Œpush è¿› arr
    arr.push(tmp)
  }
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘å‰åºéå† â€‹

éå†è¿‡ç¨‹ ï¼š æ ¹ -> å·¦ -> å³

å¯ç”¨é€’å½’ã€æ ˆéå†æ–¹å¼ã€‚ ä½¿ç”¨æ ˆéå†æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº

js
// é€’å½’
const preorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      arr.push(node.val);
      mapFn(node.left);
      mapFn(node.right);
    }
  }

  mapFn(root);

  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ - åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ ˆéå†æ—¶éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº
const preorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å…¥æ ˆ
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å­æ ‘å‡ºæ ˆ
    const node = stack.pop();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // æœ‰é¡ºåºè¦æ±‚ï¼Œå·¦å­æ ‘åå…¥æ ˆï¼Œåˆ™å…ˆå‡ºæ ˆï¼Œå³å…ˆéå†
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
  }
  return arr;
}
// é€’å½’
const preorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      arr.push(node.val);
      mapFn(node.left);
      mapFn(node.right);
    }
  }

  mapFn(root);

  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ - åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨æ ˆéå†æ—¶éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº
const preorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  // æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹å…¥æ ˆ
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å­æ ‘å‡ºæ ˆ
    const node = stack.pop();
    arr.push(node.val);
    // æœ‰é¡ºåºè¦æ±‚ï¼Œå·¦å­æ ‘åå…¥æ ˆï¼Œåˆ™å…ˆå‡ºæ ˆï¼Œå³å…ˆéå†
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
  }
  return arr;
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­åºéå† â€‹

éå†è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š å·¦ -> æ ¹ -> å³

js
// é€’å½’
const inorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      // å…ˆæ‰¾å·¦å­æ ‘
      mapFn(node.left);
      // ä¸­é—´
      arr.push(node.val);
      // å³å­æ ‘
      mapFn(node.right);
    }
  }
  mapFn(root);
  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ
const inorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;

  const stack = [];
  let node = root;
  while(stack.length || node) {
    // å…¥æ ˆï¼Œ éå†å½“å‰å­æ ‘çš„å·¦å­æ ‘å…¥æ ˆ
    while(node) {
      stack.push(node);
      node = node.left
    }
    // å‡ºæ ˆ
    const n = stack.pop();
    arr.push(n.val);
    node = n.right;
  }
  return arr;
}
// é€’å½’
const inorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      // å…ˆæ‰¾å·¦å­æ ‘
      mapFn(node.left);
      // ä¸­é—´
      arr.push(node.val);
      // å³å­æ ‘
      mapFn(node.right);
    }
  }
  mapFn(root);
  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ
const inorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  if (!root) return arr;

  const stack = [];
  let node = root;
  while(stack.length || node) {
    // å…¥æ ˆï¼Œ éå†å½“å‰å­æ ‘çš„å·¦å­æ ‘å…¥æ ˆ
    while(node) {
      stack.push(node);
      node = node.left
    }
    // å‡ºæ ˆ
    const n = stack.pop();
    arr.push(n.val);
    node = n.right;
  }
  return arr;
}

äºŒå‰æ ‘ååºéå† â€‹

éå†è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼š å·¦ -> å³ -> æ ¹

æ ˆéå†æ—¶ï¼Œ æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº

js
// é€’å½’
const postorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      mapFn(node.left);
      mapFn(node.right);
      arr.push(node.val);
    }
  }
  mapFn(root);
  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ - æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº
const postorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºæ ˆ
    const node = stack.pop();
    // æ³¨æ„: å¾€å·¦è¾¹ä¿å­˜
    arr.unshift(node.val);
    // å…¥æ ˆ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}
// é€’å½’
const postorderTraversal = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  const mapFn = (node) => {
    if (node) {
      mapFn(node.left);
      mapFn(node.right);
      arr.push(node.val);
    }
  }
  mapFn(root);
  return arr;
}

// éé€’å½’ - æ ˆ - æ³¨æ„å…¥æ ˆé¡ºåº
const postorderTraversal2 = (root) => {
  const arr = [];
  const stack = [root];
  while(stack.length) {
    // å‡ºæ ˆ
    const node = stack.pop();
    // æ³¨æ„: å¾€å·¦è¾¹ä¿å­˜
    arr.unshift(node.val);
    // å…¥æ ˆ
    node.left && stack.push(node.left);
    node.right && stack.push(node.right);
  }
  return arr;
}

è·¯å¾„æ€»å’Œ â€‹

ç»™å®šäºŒå‰æ ‘ å’Œ æ•´æ•°ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­äºŒå‰æ ‘ä¸­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ ä»æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹åˆ°å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ çš„è·¯å¾„ä¸Šçš„å€¼æ€»å’Œï¼Œç­‰äºè¯¥æ•´æ•°ã€‚

é€’å½’ï¼Œé€’å½’éå†æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€éå‡å»éå†è¿‡çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œåˆ°å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹æ—¶å’Œå‰©ä½™çš„å€¼ç›´æ¥æ¯”è¾ƒ

js
const hasPathSum = (root, targetSum) => {
  if (!root) return false;
  // å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç›´æ¥å’Œå‰©ä½™çš„ç›®æ ‡å€¼æ¯”è¾ƒ
  if (!root.left && !root.right) return root.val === targetSum;
  // é€’å½’å·¦å³å­æ ‘ï¼Œå¹¶å‡å»å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
  return hasPathSum(root.left, targetSum - root.val) || hasPathSum(root.right, targetSum - root.val);
};
const hasPathSum = (root, targetSum) => {
  if (!root) return false;
  // å¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œç›´æ¥å’Œå‰©ä½™çš„ç›®æ ‡å€¼æ¯”è¾ƒ
  if (!root.left && !root.right) return root.val === targetSum;
  // é€’å½’å·¦å³å­æ ‘ï¼Œå¹¶å‡å»å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼
  return hasPathSum(root.left, targetSum - root.val) || hasPathSum(root.right, targetSum - root.val);
};
